overview: Tony Buba trains his documentary lens on the washing of his 87-year-old grandmotherâ€™s kitchen walls, an annual ritual. While the filmmaker works diligently and mostly out of sight of the camera, his grandmother anchors the piece, recounting stories of her immigration from Italy in the 1940s, her first impressions of the United States, and her endearing love of Braddock.
title: Washing Walls With Mrs. G
